page.title: 12Chapel St. Leonards Farming
page.content: Chapel St. Leonards is well known for its crops.There are quite a few farms in Chapel St. Leonards.There are two fields at the back of my house.We usally grow wheat and barley.Every day when I get up I always hear the cattle.One third of the land is used for farming in Chapel St. Leonards. Chapel St. Leonards surrounded by fields and farmland.Most of the cows in Chapel St. Leonards do not give milk they are kept for their meat.There is an animal market in Alford every Tuesday where the cattle are bought and sold.
